Name: limit_project_budget
Description: Planned cost must not exceed each Project budget

Name: team_assignment_uniqueness
Description: Each Team is assigned to exactly one Project (R1)

Name: worker_to_single_team
Description: Each Worker belongs to exactly one Team (R2)

Name: team_capacity_respects_size
Description: Members assigned to a Team must not exceed team_size

Name: user_story_to_one_epic
Description: Each User Story belongs to exactly one Epic (R9)

Name: task_to_one_user_story
Description: Each Task belongs to exactly one User Story (R10)

Name: user_story_to_max_one_sprint_backlog
Description: Each User Story is in at most one Sprint Backlog (R11)

Name: sprint_backlog_belongs_to_one_sprint
Description: Each Sprint Backlog belongs to exactly one Sprint (R12)

Name: sprint_has_one_goal
Description: Each Sprint has exactly one Sprint Goal (R13)

Name: backlog_entry_count_consistency
Description: Entries assigned to a Product Backlog do not exceed number_of_entries

Name: sprint_backlog_capacity
Description: Planned story points in a Sprint Backlog do not exceed total_effort

Name: velocity_floor
Description: Teams must reach at least their min_velocity when planning capacity

Name: stakeholder_influence_cap
Description: Bound max Stakeholder influence engaged per Sprint Review
